title: eBikeGo appoints Iftekhar Ahmed as CEO of GreenPioneer Mobility
description: eBikeGo has partnered with GreenPioneer Mobility and appointed Iftekhar Ahmed as CEO of GreenPioneer. They aim to lead the personal mobility space in India by opening flagship stores, quick stores, and franchise outlets. GreenPioneer will launch private-label brands and a retail brand, NONSTOP, offering mobility aids and rehabilitation equipment.
